title: Scotch 8" Multi-Purpose Scissors, 2-Pack, Great for Everyday Use (1428-2)
description: Scotch Multi Purpose Scissors come with high quality stainless steel blades, great for everyday use at home, office or school. Soft comfort grip handle designed for left or right-handed. Keep them handy for everyday cutting needs, crafting projects and office tasks. Stay rest assured with a 10 year limited warranty. Contains 2, Scotch Multi-Purpose 8" Scissors with red and grey handle.
